title: November 16, 2010
content:
Updates: anti-aging, DHEA; the trust hormone- oxytocin -associated with happiness; food safety, genetic engineering; GE... <!--more--> salmon can’t feed the world; S.
510- food safety bill- why we must stop it; kids’ cup-cake stand in Westchester park shut down by police.
Maude Barlow: national chairperson for the Council of Canadians, co-founder of the Blue Planet Project, an international project to challenge corporations’ taking private control of fresh water resources.
She also holds leadership positions with Food and Water Watch, the International Forum on Globalization, & the Germany based World Future Council.
Among her 16 books, Maudes’ last international bestseller was “Blue Covenant: The Global Water Crisis and the Coming Battle for the Right to Water.”
